sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均表示"犯罪的"之意。
means: criminal ： 侧重指某种行为是违犯法律的，因而应受到惩罚。
guilty ： 主要指某种行为违反道德标准，也可指违犯法律。

sentence.Network_en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentence.Network_cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentence.Network_en: Her plea of guilty to manslaughter through provocation was rejected.
sentence.Network_cn: 她因受到挑衅而过失杀人的有罪答辩被驳回。

sentence.Network_en: Four men were found guilty of breach of the peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 四名男子被判扰乱治安罪名成立。

encyclopedia.content: 〖富士电视CX系〗 【火22】 ギルティ～悪魔と契约した女 GUILTY～与恶魔签订契约的女人 [CAST] 菅野美穂 玉木宏 吉瀬美智子 水上剣星 吉田钢太郎 RIKIYA 横山めぐみ 滝沢沙织 モロ师冈 岩本多代 唐沢寿明 [STAFF] 编剧：大久保ともみ、平野悠 [NEWS] 女星菅野美穗将主演富士电视台的秋季新剧《与恶魔签订契约的女人》，近年多扮演好人的菅野，今次一改戏路，扮演为其他人带来不幸的恶女。 菅野在剧中扮演一名极受欢迎的宠物美容师

entry.def: If you feel guilty, you feel unhappy because you think that you have done something wrong or have failed to do something which you should have done.

example.ex: I feel so guilty, leaving all this to you...
example.tran: 把这些事都留给你去做，我真感到过意不去。

example.ex: When she saw me she looked guilty.

entry.def: Guilty is used of an action or fact that you feel guilty about.

example.ex: Many may be keeping it a guilty secret...
example.tran: 许多人或许保守着这个罪恶的秘密。

example.ex: I leave with a guilty sense of relief.
example.tran: 我带着一种罪恶的解脱感离开。

entry.def: If someone is guilty of a crime or offence, they have committed that crime or offence.

example.ex: They were found guilty of murder...
He pleaded guilty to causing actual bodily harm.
example.tran: 他承认确实犯有人身伤害罪。

entry.def: If someone is guilty of doing something wrong, they have done that thing.

example.ex: He claimed Mr Brooke had been guilty of a 'gross error of judgment'...
example.tran: 他宣称布鲁克先生犯有“判断失误的重大过错”。

example.ex: They will consider whether or not he has been guilty of serious professional misconduct.
example.tran: 他们将考虑他是否犯有玩忽职守的重大过失。

means.word_mean: 1. responsible for or chargeable with a reprehensible act; or marked by guilt;

sentences.sentence: "the hangdog and shamefaced air of the retreating enemy"- Eric Linklater

auth_sentence.res_content: Everything about The Pretty Reckless is a guilty pleasure.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或小东西",常带有嬉谑性或爱称; 2. 表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后,通常表示为"状态,性质等"; 3. 表形容词,加在名词后,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的
craze狂热+y……的→crazy疯狂的
fault犯错误+y……的→adj.有过失的,有缺点的
flint极硬的东西,燧石+y……的→adj.极坚硬的
greed贪欲,贪婪+y……的→adj.贪吃的,贪婪的,渴望的
guilt罪行,内疚+y……的→adj.犯罪的,有罪的,心虚的
hill小山,丘陵+y……的→adj.多小山的;丘陵起伏的
rain雨+y……的→adj.下雨的,多雨的
sleep睡+y……的→adj.想睡的;寂静的
stead=stand站+y……的→adj.稳固的,稳定的
wind风+y……的→adj.多风的,刮风的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wood木+y……的→adj.多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
dog狗+y人或小东西→doggy小狗
fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
gran奶奶+y人或小东西→granny
kit猫+y人或小东西→kitty小猫
miss小姐,姑娘+y人或小东西→n.少女,小姑娘
old老的+y人或小东西→n.老人,陈旧之物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短的+y人或小东西→矮子
batter接连重击+y状态,性质等→殴打
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 投递,送交;交付,交货;分娩
stems_affixes.word_buile: deliver递送+y状态,性质等→投递,送交
difficult困难的+y状态,性质等→n.困难,困境,难题
discover发现,发觉+y状态,性质等→n.发现;被发现的事物
flatter阿谀,奉承+y状态,性质等→n.谄媚,阿谀,巴结,奉承
harmon+y状态,性质等→n.协调,融洽
inquire打听,询问+y状态,性质等→n.[enquiry]询问,打听,调查
jealous嫉妒的+y状态,性质等→n.妒忌,嫉妒,猜忌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
stems_affixes.word_buile: master掌握+y状态,性质等→n.控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
recover恢复,痊愈+y状态,性质等→n.恢复,痊愈,防御

Sentence.sentence: Cheating destroys self-respect and integrity, leaving the cheater ashamed, guilty and afraid of getting caught.
But, many of those who had poor relationships felt guilty.
Jackson was similar in appearance to the guilty man.

sentences.en: Then I would be guilty too.
sentences.cn: 那样的话我也要感到内疚了。

sentences.en: Bob felt guilty that he had not made an attempt to save her.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃为未曾设法救她而感到内疚。

sentences.en: The thief sought forgiveness for his guilty acts.
sentences.cn: 那小偷乞求宽恕他的罪行。

sentences.en: The man was found guilty of armed robbery, and condemned to eight years' imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 那人犯有持械抢劫罪, 因而被判八年监禁。

jushi.english: His guilty look gave him away.
jushi.chinese: 他那自知有错的神态使人一眼就看出了他有过失。

jushi.english: The thief sought forgiveness for his guilty acts.
jushi.chinese: 那小偷乞求宽恕他的罪行。

jushi.english: The three persons guilty of theft have been sent to prison.
jushi.chinese: 三个犯有偷盗罪的人被送进监狱了。
